headline: Synchrony Financial (SYF): Assessing Valuation After a Strong Multi‑Year Share Price Run
summary: Synchrony Financial (SYF) has quietly turned into a strong compounder, with the stock up about 21% this year and more than 145% over the past 3 years, outpacing many traditional lenders. See our latest analysis for Synchrony Financial. At a share price of $79.15, Synchrony’s roughly 21% year to date share price return and powerful three year total shareholder return above 140% suggest momentum is still very much on the front foot as investors reassess its growth and credit risk profile.
